alert.note: Alert for O'Brien; Osceola (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 18 at 7:11PM CDT until August 18 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OSCEOLA...SOUTHWESTERN DICKINSON...NORTHWESTERN CLAY AND NORTHERN O`BRIEN COUNTIES... At 711 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Melvin, or 11 miles southeast of Sibley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hartley around 725 PM CDT. Everly around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Moneta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
